name: Mama Mia Turreta-Alessandro's Challenge
description: It´s a game about a pizza chef, his dream is to monopolize the industry of pizza o parlors all over the world, he works at the most interesting pizza parlor, the Boar´s Pizzas, but, some gangsters want to finish with his dream and destroy the pizza parlor. You control Alessandro, the pizza chef. You have to defend the pizza parlor, building some guns that you can buy and put it on the pizza parlor to defeat the gangsters. To increase your money, you can cook some pizzas in the forge. The game ends when your pizza parlor was destroyed, if it happens his dream will be destroyed, so try hard to keep his dream alive.. Have Fun!
